string.text: "Watchdogs"
Received for the liquidation of the wild dogs pack
Wild dogs will no longer prevent stalkers from crossing the Wild Territory. Now any factions can use this path.
Achievement unlocked: "Watchdogs"
"As an evil bear!"
Received for the liquidation of General Tachenko detachment.Duty will not forgive you this.
The liquidation of General Tachenko detachment weakened the presence of Duty in the area.
Achievement unlocked: "As an evil bear!"
"Executioner"
Received for the liquidation of General Voronin. Duty will not forgive you this.
The decapitated Duty remains without its leader, an excellent chance to destroy the weakened faction.
Achievement unlocked: "Executioner"
"License for murder"
Received for the liquidation of Lukash. Freedom will not forgive you this.
Decapitated Freedom remains without its leader, an excellent chance to destroy the weakened faction.
Achievement unlocked: "License for murder"
Operation "Monolith"
Destroy all the landing troops of the military at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant
The military failed the operation "Monolith" thanks to you. You destroyed the units: Quartet, Falcon, Griffin, Peregrine Falcon, Owl, Lun, Hawk, Kite, Kestrel.
Achievement unlocked: Monolith Operation
